articles.author: Mike Oyebola
articles.title: Super Eagles star, Omeruo presents signed jersey, ball to Buhari in Spain - Daily Post Nigeria
articles.description: Super Eagles defender, Kenneth Omeruo presented a signed jersey and ball to Nigeria's number one citizen, President Muhammadu Buhari in Spain on Thursday. President Buhari, who left Nigeria on Tuesday is on a three-day visit to the European country. Omeruo pl…
articles.content:
Super Eagles defender, Kenneth Omeruo presented a signed jersey and ball to Nigeria’s number one citizen, President Muhammadu Buhari in Spain on Thursday.
